{{About|the achievement|the soundtrack|Thanks for Your Patronage!}}
'''''Thanks For Your Patronage!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain a "twice-lucky" fortune slip from a [[Welfare Meal]].
